title: Add detection rules to template-selection-rules.md
description: Update .claude/reference/template-selection-rules.md with data-analytics template detection rules: high confidence indicators (Microsoft Fabric, Power BI + semantic model, DAX, medallion architecture), medium confidence indicators, differentiation from Power Query template, and example patterns with scoring.
notes: Updated .claude/reference/template-selection-rules.md (NOTE: File path appears to be templates-specific, actual implementation would go in smart-bootstrap.md). Detection rules documented in components.json include: high confidence keywords (Microsoft Fabric, Power BI + semantic model, DAX, medallion architecture), medium confidence keywords (Power Query + transformation, semantic layer, dimensional modeling), file extensions (.dax, .pq, .m, .pbix, .bim), and differentiation from power-query template.
